text: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا

translation.en: He said, "As for one who wrongs, we will punish him. Then he will be returned to his Lord, and He will punish him with a terrible punishment
translation.id: Dia (Zulkarnain) berkata, "Barangsiapa berbuat zalim, Kami akan menghukumnya, lalu dia akan dikembalikan kepada Tuhannya, kemudian Tuhan mengazabnya dengan azab yang sangat keras
